thread.title: CERON LAWRENCE
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by CERON LAWRENCE

author: CERON LAWRENCE
title: CERON LAWRENCE
text:
Even since we moved here almost 3 years ago we have furnish our home inside and out electronics included with NFM but rarely ever get any special VIP incentive yet hear how other people have. Only thing we ever we received was a $25 off and if you look at our account you will see we have spent plenty and even used your coma y for extended warranties and installs.
Back in January we had a rep that was very demeaning to my wife and called her mean and talked down to her about the he difference between end tables and side tables. So the cause of that effect was a lost sale.
